title: Lagging a Lot  Lately
body:
I've called my ISP, had my router reset to default settings, run plenty of speedtests mid game and pre-game (both were great results) and have been experiencing lag issues for about 2 weeks now. My ping is a constant 45 but jumps randomly but frequently throughout my game to up to 170 ping. Not sure what's going on with this, but I have a hard time believing it's my net with all the troubleshooting I've done.

A lot of my friends have been saying they're experiencing ping spikes too, but I just want to see if it's a server problem for anyone else.

I'd really like to get this fixed soon so I can make a late season surge to grind ranked because as of late I've been tanking games and my ping spikes have NOT been very helpful. 

[Speed Test Result](http://www.speedtest.net/my-result/5694949478)

replies.body: Out of curiosity, what did your ISP tell you?  Is your ping constantly 170, or does it suddenly jump up?  Can you run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) of those matches, and let me know if it comes up with any results?  Let me know!
